meaningMnemonic: 応援 is <kanji>aid</kanji> and <kanji>root for</kanji>, but for this verb the "root for" one is going to be more on the money. You can call this <vocabulary>to root for</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>to cheer on</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to cheer for</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from 応援. It's also just the on'yomi readings you learned.
